contents: On Friday at 10:00 a.m., there will be a departmental meeting with Marc DeMille, Juan, and the customer service representatives. _____(3)_____  to all customer service employees, answer questions, and provide an overview of his plans. _____(4)_____ to hear your ideas. Please feel free to bring up any thoughts or concerns during this meeting. Beginning on Monday, Juan will have individual meetings with each employee to discuss specific issues in depth. Our company values _____(5)_____ and expertise about the department’s needs.
